website_summaries.verdict: This model offers multiple USB and card reader ports, and processing speeds that are adequate for most users. It stands out for its large amount of storage space.
pros: A quad core 7th generation Intel processor offers decent download speeds for all but the most graphic intensive files
SD and micro SD card reader slots
Users who need to save multiple large video or image files can do so without worrying about using up all their storage space
cons: The 8 GB of RAM is not enough to run most modern games smoothly, which means users who want a gaming unit may need to add additional memory

customer_reviews.title: Warning. Non-working version of Windows
customer_reviews.text: Warning. Non-working version of Windows. As with other reviewers, the Acer I received had a version of Windows that could not be activated. For more than 6 hours, I dealt with tech support trying to get the computer to work, but the version of Windows had been installed on too many computers, according to Microsoft. Too bad, seemed like a very nice machine for the money. However, between trying to get it to work and returning the unit, I easily spent over 600 dollars in my time.
customer_reviews.author: dennis doverspike

customer_reviews.title: ... this computer is so incredibly flimsy that it feels like it will break at any second
customer_reviews.text: The CD/DVD drive on this computer is so incredibly flimsy that it feels like it will break at any second. I have to firmly hold the CD drive just to put a disc in. And unfortunately, this computer won't play about 75% of the CDs that I have that I have made over the years, that work fine on my other desktop and laptop. The keyboard is very cheaply made and super light weight. I should have spent a little more and purchased a better desktop. Not really happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Boom! Dead out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Will revise when new unit arrives. Plugged it in, nothing. Took it to diagnostic place around the corner, diagnosis pulls up either the drive is fried or the version of Windows was corrupted. Had the thing for 15 minutes...So much for quality control.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop computer for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great desktop computer for the money. Call me old fashioned but I still like a desktop computer with a full size keyboard and a large monitor (actually I have two monitors connected). This computer has pretty much everything you need right out of the box, Plenty of computing power for most things, I am not a gamer. A large hard drive, 2 TB, and ample memory, 8 GB. If you are looking for a computer to replace your aging desktop you won't go wrong buying this.
customer_reviews.author: loustrau

customer_reviews.title: Sorry to hear some of you had problems
customer_reviews.text: I’m less than a month away from my 2 year anniversary with pc, and I’ve never had any major issues that I couldn’t resolve my self. Just ordered a mini 1660ti for it, and sooner than later I’m ordering a upgraded PSU. I’m not a fanboy of any corporation, but to say Acer didn’t win me over would be a lie. It is the best windows based machine I have and probably ever will own.
customer_reviews.author: Logan E.

customer_reviews.title: I hate to leave a negative review
customer_reviews.text: I hate to leave a negative review, but I realize that I would be failing in my duty to others if I did note share my experience. Within a couple minutes of installing this computer, it showed an error message and shut down. Then this happened every five or ten minutes, the screen would go blue and en error message would appear. Never, I repeat, NEVER, ever have I come across such a terrible computer, and I have owned literally dozens of PC's, Mac's, laptops and tablets. Please beware, is all I would say to anyone who is considering buying this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Anil M.

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire Desktop with i5 Joy
customer_reviews.text: After using Windows XP for the last 15 years this computer is lightning fast. I couldn't be happier. I never realized how slow my old computer was until I got this computer up and running. The i5 chipset is awesome. A little bit of a learning curve for Windows 10, but I am a happy camper. Instead of having many DVD's for storing my pictures and music it all fits on this hard drive with a plenty of room to spare. I still have my backups when needed but this computer is great.
customer_reviews.author: jgar529

customer_reviews.title: Acer is a disgrace to put these machines out this way and even worse for not giving a product key that works when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these...both computers came with product key not accepted by windows and thereby "windows not activated". Said the key was used elsewhere. Called Amazon, Acer and Microsoft tech support and no one could help. Microsoft even hung up on me. Returning the second computer today. DON'T buy one of these. Acer is a disgrace to put these machines out this way and even worse for not giving a product key that works when you call their tech support line. Will buy another brand and never buy Acer again and am disappointed for the first time by Amazon. Sad state of affairs. Will go to Best Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Clayton

customer_reviews.title: ... with 8gb for this price is hands down the best deal you will find anywhere today
customer_reviews.text: A i5 7 gen with 8gb for this price is hands down the best deal you will find anywhere today. It's super fast and it doesn't come with bloatware. A must buy for 449.00. FYI don't buy smartguard warranty. to me it looks like fraud. registering is awful, half the websites don't work. Anyways enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acer Desktop
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer for a week and really like it. Zippy did I mention its Zippy.Its a Microsoft Signature which means very little bloatware.It also has the latest version of Windows 10 which is nice less downloading at first. It has Windows Defender installed so its safe when you start for first time and I recommend doing all Windows update at that time. Real nice computer for the price.ZIPPY....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - DO NOT BUY!!! Windows 10 NOT included.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Could not activate windows 10 due to the product key already being used on a different device!!!! Now it's telling me to go to the store to buy "genuine Windows". Great.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Wald

customer_reviews.title: 4 Months use and going great
customer_reviews.text: I use this computer for photoshop, website editing and accounting for my small business. So far it has been great and keeping up with all the programs that I run.
customer_reviews.author: Paiute

customer_reviews.title: 6th gen model is good for the price paid.  Lacks SSD
customer_reviews.text: The 6th gen model is great for the price. BUT the windows serial was already used right out of the box. Had to call Microsoft for a free serial number. This is a comment made by many others here. That just shouldnt happen. The lack of an SSD drive is the only negative since the speed of the computer is reduced with the standard hardrive. All in all worth the bucks paid for it
customer_reviews.author: techmannn

customer_reviews.title: Intitial problems
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it working it's great, it can with some outdated driver software that causes videos and some internet pages to crash the computer but they are easy to update and once you do it is quick and works fine, may not be for someone not familiar with computers
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Died almost exactly 2 years after purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Died almost exactly 2 years after purchase. I was very happy with it until then. Technician said the power unit failed and also killed the logic board. It was connected to a surge protector. None of the other devices in my house experienced power issues. This computer was very lightly used. I think it was fair to expect it to last at least 5 years. I will never buy another Acer product.
customer_reviews.author: D KP

customer_reviews.title: NO windows 10 issue here
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be a hit or miss thing. I read the reviews and was waiting to have to spend 90 minutes getting it setup. However, to my surprise, it worked perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with the performance
customer_reviews.text: When I first plugged the desktop in it wouldn't do anything: no display or power lights. I called Amazon technical support & they were very helpful but unable to find the solution & told me to return it. I was removing the cords when I noticed the power supply was set to 220v instead of 110v. I set it to 110v, plugged the cords back in, and it powered up. So far I am very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps try another
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of owning this computer the hard drive went bad. I sent it in and they fixed it no hassle, except the three weeks without a computer. The WiFi is horrible. My laptop that is sit next to where my desktop was while getting fixed had not issues with connectivity. This desktop in the same spot has crap internet signal. I may have to get a booster just to get internet. I would recommend another desktop. I am upset with this Acer product, I have had success with some of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: RoB

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the specs. The HDD is a little noisy though
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my media station. It works great, boots right up, got everything set up quickly. It performs fast and does everything I need it to do. The only complaint is that the hard drive is a little noisy and it is constant when the computer is running. I am thinking of installing an M.2 SSD to run the OS to eliminate this. The disk HD will only be used when accessing files. I was planning to build a computer but the specs on this, and the price were a little cheaper, and it should be easy to install the M.2 SSD that I want.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: Non-Genuine Product Key for Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: The product key that came with Windows was "already used." However, upon contacting Microsoft Support the problem was *somewhat* easy to resolve. I did not have to pay for a new license. If you do not have patience for phone calls, there is also a chat option for support, and that is why I say somewhat. I chose 3 stars because the computer runs fine, and after having the genuine Windows downloaded I am confident in the product. I would give it a higher rating, had it not given me complications.
customer_reviews.author: Perryn

customer_reviews.title: Invalid windows product key
customer_reviews.text: Warning. Non-working version of Windows. As with other reviewers, the Acer I received had a version of Windows that could not be activated. For more than 6 hours, I dealt with tech support trying to get the computer to work, but the version of Windows had been installed on too many computers, according to Microsoft. Called Acer back to explain they sold me a computer with a non-valid product code key for windows and their response was your out of warranty you can go to a third party and pay them to correct it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, processor is fast
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, processor is fast, Only good thing about Windows 10 is that shearch is 100x better. Once I got my icons back on the desktop I can use it better; hate losing old chess game, can't find anything like it online. The corded mouse and keyboard worked well, but I got wireless from Logitec and they are good and both only take up one usb port. Got the monitor and love it but wish it had speakers and mic built in to help avoid clutter. don't like to fool with headphones. I looked a lot and brlieve this is the best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: rmcg.

customer_reviews.title: This was the easiest PC to set up of any ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest PC to set up of any I have owned over the past 30 years. The process should be getting easier and it is. I connected printer, external HDD, HDMI monitor, speakers, and my old wireless mouse & KB; turned it on and everything worked. It found my wireless router - I entered password and was on line. All I had to do was change MS browser to Firefox and set up G-mail account. No paper instructions in package and none needed. This is a lot of computer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dklewis333

customer_reviews.title: Latest Intel chip, fully loaded, excellent machine at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: I've been in Windows computer support for 25 years, and I can tell you that machines like this can go for $200 more.All I gave it was an upgrade to Windows 10 Pro, and it performs really, really well. (Admittedly I have not tried the included keyboard and mouse, and won't until my current choices wear out.)
customer_reviews.author: Will Roberts

customer_reviews.title: King of Crashes
customer_reviews.text: This may be my second review on Amazon after nearly a decade as a customer. i spent a good amount of time looking for a good value desktop for general business uses. I thought i found it. However it has barely been used as it keeps crashing. I reset Windows 10, and it just hangs on the reset. I did a reinstall of Windows 10 with a clean wipe. Still hangs. I'm pretty tech savvy but this has me stumped. I believe there is some conflict with the internal graphics. Now I have a 20 pound paperweight. Can't say I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Palek

customer_reviews.title: value for the dollar!
customer_reviews.text: now iv been reviewing this computer from @techdeals on youtube.... saw it and loved it....and im switching from a old gateway m series i had since 2008....and the experience is revolutationary... paired with my hp pavilion 21.5inch panel.... this thing is fast... keyboard and mouse feels slightly cheapish which is my only con...amazing value for the money...shipped on time too
customer_reviews.author: MrPayne

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing about this computer is that it has Bill's ...
customer_reviews.text: Acer is sending these things out with Windows 10 OS that has already been activated on some other device. I spent days between Amazon, Acer and Microsoft trying to activate the OS to no avail. Had to pay extra to get it to activate. The unit seems to run OK but nothing to brag about. My HP printer doesn't work as well as it did with my old Vista OS. The worst thing about this computer is that it has Bill's windows 10 for an OS. Terrible system for a desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Carl McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: I read all the bad reviews so I knew what I was getting into. The Windows license issue was a minus but this tower is very good for its price overall. So I bought it. It turned out the license issue did exist. But it took me less than 30 minutes on the phone with a Microsoft agent to solve it. So I would not complain.
customer_reviews.author: tucaoneo

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  never had one fail out of 10+
customer_reviews.text: I usually swap in a fast SSD and upgrade to Windows Pro. WiFi, card reader. Tons of room (if not too much) for expansion.
customer_reviews.author: J Hill

customer_reviews.title: Like most computers today
customer_reviews.text: The computer has enough storage space and comes with Windows. Like most computers today, there is little difference with other products, the speed of the computer is fast and it fits nicely where a desktop should. I do like that the computer is extremely quiet also. The best feature though, is the price, hundreds less than some of its competitors with the same features and quality. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Ernest M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Good mid-level computer
customer_reviews.text: This PC was much larger that I thought it would be but it fit into the desk with no problem. I guess the advantage is that to add expansion cards will be easier. The unit performs well on the tests I ran and comes with Windows installed and ready to run. This a good machine for mid-level work and will be fine as a home or home-officer computer.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Using it now ....
customer_reviews.text: Nice little computer that replaced my previous model due to the hard drive crashing. Lost all my data. This updated model provided a new feature such as built in wifi that I appreciate. My only con (so far) is that the system is unable to be upgraded without removing some other needed device such as the DVD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent value for the specs, but the build quality is rather poor
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a decent value for the specs, but the build quality is rather poor. As a small example, I have never seen such a flimsy dvd drive, which looks and feels as if it is about to disintegrate before your very eyes. This is my first experience with Acer, and, based on its build quality, I will not be buying any Acer products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer needs to look at why this model has so many problems.
customer_reviews.text: Really, really disappointed. I read the reviews and counted on any previous issues being addressed by the manufacturer. Followed instructions to remove McAfee and Norton, but neither was pre-installed. Started up once with Windows 10 (after three tries). Seemed okay long enough to install Microsoft Home and Office. Shut down on it's own and would not reboot with Windows. Called the tech center three times. Attempts to reset to factory settings did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Easy set up. Did have to chat with MicroSoft to get Windows 10 activated. Did have a bad DVD writer ... chatted with Acer level 2 support. Determined the DVD drive was bad. Acer sent a replacement drive in 2 days. I replaced the bad drive with the replacement in about 1 hour. Now the Aspire TC-780 is smokin’ fast and all is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Good basic computer.
customer_reviews.text: On a budget, this is a nice desktop to have. The motherboard has a wifi card already which is a nice extra feature on tower computers. It only uses on board display ports, so a video card is needed for most games. Does general office work just fine as is. Optical drive feels cheap, and the shape of the case is different, but not a bad item.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer "service"
customer_reviews.text: It came with a significant software problem that I discovered on a Saturday. After two hours on the phone with customer disservice I learned that I could get no help because it was a weekend. You'd think I could have learned that within five minutes. And then it was Wednesday before anyone bothered to return my call. By then I'd bitten the bullet and spent some money on my computer tech and on buying a functioning version of the faulty software. I will never buy another Acer product
customer_reviews.author: Throbble Fleep

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire Desktop hardware works correctly but Acer phone support does not
customer_reviews.text: Hardware is exactly as described. Came pre-loaded with Windows 10 64-bit Home OS not activated. When I went to activate Microsoft indicated the installed key had already been activated on another PC. Called Acer phone support and spoke with 3 different representatives for over 2 hours. Acer could not provide a valid Windows 10 activation key. Acer needed to ship a USB thumb drive with Windows OS for a fresh install to resolve issue.
customer_reviews.author: ableals

customer_reviews.title: I love this computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. It is very fast and can handle several apps opened at the same time, including memory-hungry ones like Photoshop, and even my 10 zillion tabs opened on my browser ... my only complain is that it is very noisy and the DVD/CD player is kind of capricious with times when it does not recognize there is a disk inside and I have to load and reload ...
customer_reviews.author: Calafia

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine for the price, full 300 watt power ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid machine for the price, full 300 watt power supply, does not accept double sized video cards as built I had to cut a metal piece out to fit my 1050ti with dual fans and it interferes with the second hard drive bay so as long as I run the dual fan card I will have to use the 1 2T hard drive. I have been running Mass Effect for a few days and everything works there is an open memory bay for another 8 gb ordering that today.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mccarter

customer_reviews.title: It is easy up-grade, with the ability to accept 32gb of ...
customer_reviews.text: This tower's specs are very strong for the price. I have had the machine paired with a Samsung monitor for about two months, without any problems. It runs fast, with the ability to run office products with aplomb. Graphics are not for the 'gamer' but this is not what the machine was designed for. It is easy up-grade, with the ability to accept 32gb of ram, and an additional graphics card if desired, or needed. Hard to beat the price for the specifications and capabilities. A good buy...
customer_reviews.author: Richardt Vogt

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS COMPUTER - SHADY REFURBISHER
customer_reviews.text: This computer was supposed to be new but was a refurbished unit that didn't update the version of Windows. Windows would not activate. Defective! I'm returning it for a refund. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great PC. Affordable price point for office work. Have had no issues using this PC to browse the internet and email for months. Will update if I have any issues, but it has been a great experience thus far.
customer_reviews.author: John Boychuk

customer_reviews.title: so that was a happy surprise. I wound up using the other keyboard ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, despite the picture, I did not realize that the computer came with a keyboard, so that was a happy surprise. I wound up using the other keyboard I had purchased, however, as the keyboard the computer came with felt cramped and forced me to click multiple buttons at the same time for some keys. It was nice - just not for my use.
customer_reviews.author: ANNRB

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my grandparents. Computer works well except ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandparents. Computer worked well except that Windows wouldn't activate because the key was supposedly already in use on another device. Tried troubleshooting within Windows and was prompted to "buy a legitimate copy of Windows," which was very frustrating. Was able to resolve with Acer tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bable

customer_reviews.title: Cheap components
customer_reviews.text: Decent computer at first, bought 2 for my kids for homeschooling computers. 18 months later and both motherboards have died. Cheap components throughout. Replaced the motherboard in 1 and put my old GTX 970 and my daughter is still using it for Minecraft and other games.
customer_reviews.author: bigmidgeman

customer_reviews.title: Good PC for a nice price!
customer_reviews.text: Good choice for a home PC. Easy to setup. Very competitive price. No issues after several months and I use it almost daily (though not a heavy user). Included WINDOWS 10 which was easy to use and has some nice features (I previously was using VISTA on my old PC).
customer_reviews.author: Smurf

customer_reviews.title: One hell of a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: After some reviews on YouTube I have this shot. I’m a browser heavy user who also needs to edit PDFs and images so high functionality with Adobe products was a must. I added an extra 8GB of RAM, paired it with a 27” monitor and it’s kicking butt!
customer_reviews.author: Justin G

customer_reviews.title: Desktop isn't even a year old and isn't working right ...
customer_reviews.text: Desktop isn't even a year old and isn't working right. Called Amazon to get a replacement and they said you have to wait 10 days to get it fixed. I run my business with this computer so I can't be down 10 days. Thanks a lot Amazon for selling a product you won't back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and operate
customer_reviews.text: This tower arrived in excellent shape. It was easy to setup. It has operated flawlessly. The graphic and speed are excellent. We ordered this tower as we already have a Acer Laptop and find the brand to be excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Lookin for comfort

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something affordable and usable for my kids. They don't need anything high speed. They play their Roblox and Minecraft and web games easily. The computer was easy to set up and works like a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Regalado

customer_reviews.title: Irritating Grinding Noise
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this PC due to the grinding noise. As soon as I purchased it and turned it on, the grinding noise started and did not stop for 30 minutes. I restarted it and tried again but the grinding noise never went away. I returned the product because I didn't see myself listening to that noise over the next 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dhruva Krishna

customer_reviews.title: The copy of Windows is not genuine
customer_reviews.text: don't buy, this is none genuine windows, the windows operating system on this machine has been installed so many times, it is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jay D

customer_reviews.title: Everything is snappy and if you slap an extra 8gb stick of memory and a 1050 ti it's a great game machine as well
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Got this instead of building a ryzen PC since there's some issues with the AM4 platform currently and I just wanted something asap. Everything is snappy and if you slap an extra 8gb stick of memory and a 1050 ti it's a great game machine as well. Didn't have any issues with windows 10 license. Planning on building a Zen 3 PC but for now this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Costello

customer_reviews.title: Acer has defects
customer_reviews.text: This product did not even work!! A problem that I tried to fix for days. I finally sent it back and bought another brand. The next desktop is excellent!! I should have ordered it to begin with. I would have saved my valuable time!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Donahue

customer_reviews.title: This PC has a lot of power and is really fast!
customer_reviews.text: This PC packs a lot of power under the hood, good amount of storage and RAM. ACER care center is an excellent tool included to keep it up to date.
customer_reviews.author: Jr330

customer_reviews.title: whale sea
customer_reviews.text: I just set everything up, and it was very easy. I noticed a lot of complaints about an invalid copy of Windows 10, but my operating system seems just fine. So far everything is working okay; if the device fails due to low-quality components in the near future, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with this desktop, speed and performance for this price can not get much better than this. If your looking for a gaming rig, look somewhere else; if you need a basic desktop for the family and you're in a budget, BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: MLB1976

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but great computer 10/10 suggest for very lightweight gaming and web browsing!
customer_reviews.text: The computer its self is a bit flimsy but thats not going to stop me from giving a great review. Its a great computer. Fast for web browsing and all that. Would not suggest for gaming UNLESS you put a graphics card in it. I can run games with the chip that it has but it can only run lightweight games. 10/10 suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this tower
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this tower. Good price for the components that come with it. Lots of opportunity for upgrades based upon the design of the motherboard and the room in the tower. Plan on using/upgrading this desktop for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Computer appeared to come in a sealed, unopened box, but immediately after turning on we found out that the Windows key has already been used elsewhere, preventing us from completing setup.
customer_reviews.author: Moringa Source Llc

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Speed is Good
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with this computer, been using it a few months now. I've been through the wringer this year with computers and this one has finally put me at ease. Great speed for my everyday work tasks and video editing. Runs quietly as well. Finally a computer that isn't giving me fits and glitches, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: been an amazing computer for the price, you cant build this computer or one like it for cheaper that's why i bought this one instead of building another. i'm planing to adding 8gb more of ram and a Graphics card to be able to run my RC simulators
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good solid computer. Replaced an older unit I loved that died after five years. Fast and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: IT

customer_reviews.title: Nice Home Use
customer_reviews.text: Great Home computer. Great price. Nice features. Easy set up. I followed the directions of another reviewer as far as windows defender. Now I don't have all the pop-up ads that my last computer was filled with. So far so good. Fast.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Acer Aspire Desktop
customer_reviews.text: Acer Aspire Desktop is a good system and with a graphics card added your ready to game.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hammond

customer_reviews.title: No Windows Activation
customer_reviews.text: Came without valid Windows Activation key. Says the activation key was already used on another computer. This is right out of the box. No quality control apparently with this brand. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this pc
customer_reviews.text: It is a good machine and works great. Had one hiccup but that was due to Windows 10 and an update that broke my sound. It has since been corrected and sound is back to working great again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris "Great day for hay"

customer_reviews.title: like a toilet
customer_reviews.text: A necessary thing, like a toilet. Very nice and serves my purpose. Only complaint is Windows; mail disappears and re-appears whenever.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, Fast !
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a new computer in 8 years. Lots of changes have happened in that time , and this computer will help you through all of it, Smart Fast and easy to use, Thanks Acer!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a while now. Works well, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad deal
customer_reviews.text: activate windows notice on all screens feeling ripped off will return unit. Returned unit, 2nd one same thing happened. Don't buy ,
customer_reviews.author: vapormonkey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular computer because it's an updated model of my previous Acer, which lasted forever. So far I am nothing but happy with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Church, Author Fate of the True Vampires

customer_reviews.title: But even with the RAM it came with it's a great machine and a wonderful upgrade from the old i3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading the RAM has been difficult. It's unclear what type is required. But even with the RAM it came with it's a great machine and a wonderful upgrade from the old i3 I had. Would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a month but so far it is meeting my needs and is working fine. I had an Acer prior to this one and it lasted five years and expect that this one will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Office, fine for gaming
customer_reviews.text: If you need a good pc for a good price, this is your best option, at least on amazon, It has a loot of good pc parts for the price, excellent for office and low gaming, the only problem i found so fat its that if you want to install a gpu you will have to change the psu if it needs to be powered with a 6-pi cord or so, at least i didn't find that coord in the included one, anyways its an excellent product, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Juorceba

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple of weeks and it works just fine. The learning curve on switching from Microsoft 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the computer for a couple of weeks and it works just fine. The learning curve on switching from Microsoft 3 to 10 is taking a bit longer! Shipping and set up were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves this! He's 95 and has been ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this ! He's 95 and has been buying el cheapos for years, so I finally got him something with some speed !
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use it for a lot of video and audio editing. I've had it for about a year, and I've had no issues with it. Keyboard and mouse were on the cheap side, so I replaced them.
customer_reviews.author: Dara Bryant

customer_reviews.title: You buy a hammer it better pound a nail
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? You buy a hammer it better pound a nail! This works great. popped right in to the infrastructure! Plenty of snap for my application!
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: 3rd bad after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: power quit after 1 week thanks to Amazon for the refund this was the 3rd of these Acer desktops that did this I will never buy another Acer desktop
customer_reviews.author: wos

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! DIED QUICK! just after warranty expired! RIP OFF.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is the first PC I've ever purchased which died right after 1 year of use. RIP OFF. Nice work Acer... No wonder people invest in Apple and Dell products. This PC is garbage...STAY AWAY. I'd give zero or negative stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: ereader

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: So far, it working fine. Pretty fast. I'm not into games, just business use, so I'm probably not a good evaluator.
customer_reviews.author: From Houston

customer_reviews.title: Time to upgrade your PC!  Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: Great price with option to upgrade memory. Nice upgrade to Windows 10 PC with plenty of processing power. Runs a little bit loud, though not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: E-ReaderTechieGuy

customer_reviews.title: Plenty Of Power For The Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great desktop for the money. Plenty of power, speed, and storage. Quick and easy to use once I got used to Windows 10. So far, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heyspock

customer_reviews.title: A good Deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in a basic computer to get the job done. Wi-Fi, good processor speed, video speed, Sound, ram and hard drive space. No extra bells and whistles just the necessities on board. A fast cheap computer upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: I added a low cost PCI to SATA card and a power cord expander that allowed for easy addition of the HDD
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a week ago. So far it is working perfectly! It is fast for a lower cost computer. The only issue I had was that it does not directly support a second hard disk drive; however, I added a low cost PCI to SATA card and a power cord expander that allowed for easy addition of the HDD.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for aboout 8 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for aboout 8 months and I have not had any problems. Connect the wires and go to work. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: So far, about a year in, it works fine. Hard drive is noisy.
customer_reviews.author: gkoutnik

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was having doubts about the pc, because of the customer reviews. The reviews complained about Windows not working , and the PC being very loud, but when my PC came, it worked great the first time i turned it on, and windows is working perfectly. The computer is quiet and does little to no sound. I'm very happy with it and would buy it again if i had to choose a PC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fine but like others have said there are quality issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer at the end of April. It's fine but like others have said there are quality issues. After just 3 months the motherboard needs to be replaced. It is covered under warranty but they do no cover shipping and it will take 10 days to get it repaired. Since I work on my computer I'm just going to have to make this repair myself.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz1214

customer_reviews.title: Hard Drive Problems
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 18, 2017. Hard drive went out last week ordering new one, Seagate! Of all the computers I've had never had to replace a hard drive this new!
customer_reviews.author: owleyes1984

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the speed on this PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer to replace our two year old Dell that was painfully slow to load. I am very happy with the speed on this PC. I doesn't come with a lot of set up instructions but if you've done it before it shouldn't be a problem for you. Overall I think it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven S Stump

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price on a powerful desktop computer. And it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Roddick

customer_reviews.title: Acer doesn't update their graphics drivers so goes obsolete faster than necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Can't run Windows Mixed Reality VR because Acer is still on WDDM 2.1 graphics drivers (even though WDDM 2.3 was released last November 2017)
customer_reviews.author: sailfurther

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me and is much faster than my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me and is much faster than my old unit about 6 years old. Came in fast and had no problems with the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Kolohe

customer_reviews.title: Just don't expect to add another hard drive
customer_reviews.text: Just don't expect to add another hard drive without adding a card or M2 ssd. Both SATA ports are taken up already and there are no extra ports.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the price and easy upgrade for a 1050 graphics card
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud but good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to work very well, but it is a bit noisier than I am used to. No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fast computer, set up was easy, windows 10 is fast and good.!!
customer_reviews.author: David W. Hendrick

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire Desktop, 7th Gen Intel Core i5-7400, 8GB DDR4, 2TB HDD, Windows 10 Home, TC-780-AMZKi5
product_meta.description: Style:DesktopAcer Aspire TC-780-AMZKi5 Desktop PC comes with these specs: 7th Generation Intel Core i5-7400 processor 3.0GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.5GHz, Windows 10 Home, 8GB DDR4 2400MHz Memory, Intel HD Graphics 630, 8X DVD-Writer Double-Layer Drive (DVD-RW), 2TB 7200RPM SATA3 Hard Drive, Digital Media Card Reader -Secure Digital (SD) Card, High Definition Audio with 5.1-Channel Audio Support, 3 - USB 3.0 Ports, 4 - USB 2.0 Ports, 1 - HDMI Port, 1 - VGA Port, Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0 LE, USB Keyboard and Mouse, 18.43 lbs. | 8.36 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DT.B89AA.008). Operating System Architecture 64-bit
feature_bullets: 7th Generation Intel Core i5-7400 Processor (Up to 3.5GHz)
